ygData.subject: Re: Arrrgh! I've had it!
ygData.msgSnippet: ive been going to najena (sp?) and picking off large and greater skeletons (beware the trains and rushes).  if you can get a good party lavastorm is a good
ygData.messageBody:
ive been going to najena (sp?) and picking off large and greater skeletons
(beware the trains and rushes). if you can get a good party lavastorm is a
good place to kill fire drakes and dervishes, and even fire elementals if
you have some spell casters and\or tanks with magic weapons.

another good place is n ro, and using your detect undead spell. since
lesser mummies and zombies are good to kill now that you have ward undead, i
have been focusing more on finding quality undead (i can sometimes take
yellow-red undead if i have a good pet).

on a side note, does anyone think pets gain from exp? personally, ive kept
a blue pet and had a good run of kills (a few young kodiaks, a halfling,
bunch of skels) and i noticed that he was hitting faster, and stunning
creatures. i conned him, and low and behold he conned black! maybe i was
on crack, but im going to try it again to verify it for myself.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro

>From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>Hello,
>I'm a DE Necro who is frustrated with the 9th level. I've died and lost it
>4
>times now and can't seem to get above one bubble of exp before I lose it.
>Hunting
>in the forest seems to be worthless, only an occasional skeleton gives me
>any
>exp (or a kodiak if I can find one), the haflings eat me for lunch. I've
>been
>to
>east commons a few times but I die as much as I make experience. Befallen
>seems to be too hard (and I die) or too easy (and no exp). Am I doing
>something wrong? Should I be hunting elsewhere? I've about had it with my
>necro character, I've recently started a human mage in Freeport (eech) and
>he's having a much easier time. I don't mind slow going but I like to see
>some
>character advancement.
>
>Any suggestions? Any help? I'm about to give up..
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
